kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Window Size
kw.doc: Sets current windows size to given ``width`` and ``height``.

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Set Selenium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout that is used by various keywords.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.sourcename: When I access the navigation bar link "${linkText}"

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then I must see the page with the header "${textHeader}"
kw.sourcename: Then I must see the page with the header "${text}"

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.
